verses.name: Genesis 17:18
verses.text: And Abraham said unto God, O that Ishmael might live before thee!

verses.name: Genesis 17:19
verses.text: And God said, Sarah thy wife shall bear thee a son indeed; and thou shalt call his name Isaac: and I will establish my covenant with him for an everlasting covenant, and with his seed after him.

verses.name: Genesis 17:20
verses.text: And as for Ishmael, I have heard thee: Behold, I have blessed him, and will make him fruitful, and will multiply him exceedingly; twelve princes shall he beget, and I will make him a great nation.
